lead_paragraph: CARPENTER--David Chandler, 74, died January 9, 2016 surrounded by his loving family. He leaves his wife of 24 years, Elizabeth, son Stefan, daughter Leslie Kolczak (Franck), stepson Adam Gould (Natalie), and adored grandchildren, Luc and Sasha. David graduated from Middlebury College and Rutgers University, and was very happily retired after a successful career in international and private banking. He enjoyed life to the fullest until the very end. David's passions included family, friends, world travel, gourmet cooking and good wine. 1/3
